channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0408; 09:13AM; 6400 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/450K070" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/450K070</a>; #HydePark; 37 firefighters spent 17 minutes in the offensive mode, fully extinguishing a well-involved fire. No injuries were reported, and no occupants were located in the home during searches. Companies remain on-scene for overhaul and salvage of property; traffic will be temporarily affected in the immediate area.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E294 E57 E66 E94 RA266 RA66 RA866 SO1 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Lyndsey Lantz

Structure Fire; INC#0408; 08:56AM; 6400 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/450K070" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/450K070</a>; #HydePark; Firefighters onscene report a one-story single family dwelling, with fire showing from the rear of the home and from the attic. First arriving companies will be in the offensive mode, entering the structure and proceeding to the roof to attack the fire.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E294 E57 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 SQ21 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Lyndsey Lantz

Technical Rescue; INC#1682; 08:58PM; 7001 S Central Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3V8wKZI" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3V8wKZI</a>; Florence; LAFD arrived to find an unknown age male postal employee with his leg trapped between 2 conveyor belts. Firefighters, including Urban Search and Rescue (USAR), have successfully freed the patient from entrapment and will transport to an area hospital in unknown condition. Nothing further.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 E203 E205 E233 E3 E33 EM13 HR3 RA21 RA5 T3 T33 T5 UR3 UR5 UR88; CH7; 13; Jennifer Middleton

Traffic; INC#1556; 07:29PM; 491 E 42nd Pl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3V2rfvf" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3V2rfvf</a>; Historic South-Central; LAFD on scene of a 4 vehicle traffic collision with no entrapment. Seven patients are being assessed for injuries, with two persons being transported to area hospitals. #LATraffic: Expects delays due street closures until LAFD and LAPD operations are complete. No further details. LAPD Inc# 4120.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E14 E21 E221 E46 EM1 HR3 RA14 RA21 SQ21 T21; CH7; 13; Jennifer Middleton

Physical Rescue; INC#1301; 04:37PM; 1354 W 46th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/451nSt8" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/451nSt8</a>; Vermont Square; LAFD arrived to find 1 car collided into a building trapping a person between the vehicle and the structure. Sadly, the trapped patient was determined deceased on scene by firefighters. The condition of the vehicle's driver is unknown at this time. Los Angeles City Building and Safety were notified and are responding to assess the extent of damage to the building. LAPD Inc# 3399. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E266 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA266 RA46 RA66 RA846 T15 T66; CH7; 13; Jennifer Middleton

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:11PM; 7708 N Eton Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Kra9lP" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Kra9lP</a>; Canoga Park; Firefighters arrived to find an outside rubbish fire exposing and extending into a single family home. A portion of the first 32 LAFD firefighters engaged in extinguishing the exterior fire, while the remainder of the crew made entry into the occupancy. While inside the structure, a small amount of smoke and fire was located adjacent to the exterior burn and was successfully extinguished in 17 minutes. No injuries to civilians or fire department members. Cause under investigation. Nothing further; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA104 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:11PM; 7708 N Eton Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Kra9lP" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Kra9lP</a>; Canoga Park; Outside rubbish fire extending into a one story single family dwelling. Offensive mode.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E105 E106 E296 E305 E72 RA104 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0831; 12:05PM; 7401 W Manchester Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wIMKcJ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wIMKcJ</a>; Westchester; Within 18 minutes, thirty two firefighters extinguished flames confined to a detached converted garage in the rear of a single story residence. No occupants or pets were found during search of the occupancy. Cause under investigation. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E205 E295 E51 E67 E95 RA43 RA95 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Jennifer Middleton

Structure Fire; INC#0831; 12:05PM; 7401 W Manchester Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3wIMKcJ" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3wIMKcJ</a>; Westchester; 1 story single family home with smoke showing from converted garage. Offensive mode.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 E205 E295 E51 E67 E95 RA43 RA95 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Jennifer Middleton

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0442; 09:18AM; 11729 W Hartsook St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4dVCvlW</a>; #ValleyVillage; Firefighters found fire to the rear, inside of a single family home. Thirty-two LAFD firefighters extinguished the flames in 19 minutes. Two elderly females sustained minor smoke inhalation and will be transported to the hospital. Cause under investigation.; FS 60; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E86 E87 E88 E89 E97 EM11 EM17 EM5 HR3 RA102 RA86 RA860 RA889 RA89 SO1 SQ87 T27 T60 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
